modName: Superior Rock Textures - Hiqh Quality HD 2K and 4K and 1K replacers
summary:
SIMPLY THE BEST AND MOST REALISTIC textures for rocks and mountains. Crafted with meticulous attention to detail to achieve realism without compromising game performance. Comes in HD 2K and 1K

UPDATE: 4K version is now Available!
descriptionHtml:
[img]https://imageshack.com/scaled/large/59/9hst.jpg[/img]
Superior Rock Textures
Another simple mod that can make your environment look a lot better. These are high quality, hand-made texture for the rocks and mountains. Crafted with meticulous attention to details to achieve utmost realism without compromising your game performance.
Comes with two resolution settings: HD-2K and Lite 1K.

FEATURES:
- Realistic High Defintion 2k Rock & mountain Textures
- Also available in Lite Version 1K for performance
- Enhanced Normal map for better "3D look" (best used with ENB)
- Available in Six (6) diferent color schemes to match your other texture pack replacers: Default (Dark Grey), Default (Light-Grey), Brown, Moss Green, Rusty & Silver-Grey
- Ultra-HD 4K versions of Default Dark Grey and Light Grey colors released for screenarchers [i]*DISCLAIMER 4K Resolution textures (or higher) are not recommended for normal gameplay as it may cause instability due to VRAM overload[/i]

Installation:
Extract the archive contents into your Skyrim data folder, overwrite the files when prompted.

=======================================================================
Permissions:
=======================================================================
You may not upload this mod to any other site other than NEXUS
You may not use or modify the assets from this mod on your own mods without permission from the author.

[center]Video Comparison by Hodilton
